A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Visually spectacular\, spectacularly acted\, almost everything else about it is a spectacular failure.
Characters either experience no growth whatsoever or\, in Luke's case\, reverse the growth they experienced in previous installments. New characters are insipid. A real waste of a talented cast.
Major and minor plot holes abound (free-falling contact bombs in space?)

Worst moment: Leia flies like Peter Pan.

There are hairy duck puppies that are neither funny nor endearing unless you are under 5 years old\, but thankfully they barely take up 15 seconds of screen time.

I'd go on\, but it's not worth it.
